articles.description: At some point Bruno Fernandes will need to be given a rest, but as demonstrated vs. Istanbul Basaksehir, Man United can't afford to do without him.
articles.content: MANCHESTER, England -- Ole Gunnar Solskjaer said ahead of Istanbul Basaksehir's visit to Old Trafford that Manchester United will have to find a way to cope without Bruno Fernandes at some stage this… [+4769 chars]
